tool_description:
Sports Information API for NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, Men's College Basketball & Much more! Get Started for Free

Updates: Bugs fixed & New endpoints added!
name: Sports Information
title: Sports Information

api_list.name: SOCCER Team Roster
api_list.description:
Get SOCCER Team Roster

Parameters:
teamId (* required)
league (Default: 'eng.1')
season (Default: '2023')

api_list.name: SOCCER League Stats
api_list.description:
Get League Stats

Parameters:
league (Default: 'eng.1')

api_list.name: SOCCER Schedule
api_list.description:
Get Soccer/Football schedule

league (Default: 'eng.1')

api_list.name: TENNIS Scoreboard
api_list.description:
In this endpoint you get all the available scoreboard.

Parameters:
year (YYYY)
month (MM)
day (DD)
league (default: 'atp'. Available 'atp' | 'wta')

api_list.name: TENNIS Player Profile
api_list.description:
In this endpoint, you can get profile info, current tournament, and news related to the player.

Parameters:
playerId (The player id). Example: 3782

api_list.name: TENNIS Schedule
api_list.description:
Get Tennis Schedule

year (YYYY) required
type (Default: 'atp'. Available: 'atp' , 'wta')

api_list.name: TENNIS Rankings
api_list.description:
Get TENNIS Rankings

Parameters:
year (YYYY) required
type (Default: 'atp'. Accepted Values: 'atp' | 'wta' )

api_list.name: MLB Team Roster
api_list.description: Get MLB Team Roster

api_list.name: MLB Player Statistic
api_list.description: Get MLB Player Statistic

api_list.name: MLB News
api_list.description: Get MLB News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-information.p.rapidapi.com/mlb/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-information.p.rapidapi.com/mlb/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: Get Standings
api_list.description: Gets the team standings for College Football.

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Group is 80 for FBS, 81 for FCS

api_list.name: Get Conferences
api_list.description: Gets the list of all College Football conferences and their identification info for ESPN.

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Group is 80 for FBS, 81 for FCS

api_list.name: Get Scoreboard
api_list.description: Gets the College Football scoreboard data for a specified date if available.

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Group is 80 for FBS, 81 for FCS

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit on the number of results @default 300

optional_parameters.name: seasontype
optional_parameters.description: Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4. default: 1

api_list.name: Get Schedule
api_list.description: Gets the College Football schedule data for a specified date if available.

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Please enter the available group for the corresponding year

optional_parameters.name: seasontype
optional_parameters.description: Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4. default= 2

api_list.name: Get Rankings
api_list.description: Gets the CFB rankings data for a specified year and week if available.

api_list.name: Get School Commits
api_list.description:
Gets the College Football School commitment data for a specified school and year.

Parameters:
year: Format (YYYY)
school: name of the school. Available list:  
          Boston college || clemson || Duke || Florida State || Georgia Tech 
          || Louisville || miami || nc state || north carolina || pittsburgh || 
          syracuse || virginia || virginia tech || wake forest

optional_parameters.name: school
optional_parameters.description:
Name of the school. Default: 'Florida State'.
         * Available Schools
          Boston college || clemson || Duke || Florida State || Georgia Tech 
          || Louisville || miami || nc state || north carolina || pittsburgh || 
          syracuse || virginia || virginia tech || wake forest

api_list.name: Get School Rankings
api_list.description: Gets the College Football School recruiting data for a specified year and page if available.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page number. 50 result per page. example: 1

api_list.name: Get Player Rankings
api_list.description: Gets the College Football Player recruiting data for a specified year, page, position, state and institution type if available.

api_list.name: Get Picks
api_list.description:
Gets the College Football PickCenter data for a specified game.

Parameters:
**id** Game id. For example: 401256194
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-information.p.rapidapi.com/cfb/picks/401256194"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: NFL - Get Schedule

Gets the NFL schedule data for a specified date if available.
If you want the current schedule, make sure the parameter **current = true.**

optional_parameters.name: current

required_parameters.name: group

optional_parameters.name: seasontype
optional_parameters.description: Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4. Default: 1

api_list.name: NCAA - Get Team Data
api_list.description: Get the Team Data from the NCAA Stats website.

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: Sport abbreviation. Acceptable values: 'MBA' = Baseball, 'MBB' = Men's basketball, 'MFB' = Men's Football, 'MIH' = Men's Ice-hockey, 'MLA' = Men's Lacrosse', 'MSO' = Men's Soccer, 'MTE' = Men's Tennis, 'MVB' = Men's Volleyball, 'MWP' = Men's Water Polo, 'WBB' = Women's Basketball, 'WBW' = Women's Bowling, 'WFH' = Field Hockey, 'WIH' = Women's Ice-Hockey, 'WLA' = Women's Lacrosse, 'WSB' = Women's Softball, 'WSO' = Women's Soccer, 'WSV' = Women's Beach Volleyball, 'WTE' = Women's Tennis, 'WVB' = Women's Volleyball, 'WWP' = Women's Water Polo

required_parameters.name: division
required_parameters.description: Division, for college football: 11 for FBS, 12 for FCS, otherwise 1 for Division-I, 2 for Division-II, 3 for Division-III.

required_parameters.name: gameHigh
required_parameters.description: Logical, indicating whether the statistic desired is of the game-high variety. 'Y' | 'N'

required_parameters.name: season
required_parameters.description: Season of query, value for 2016-2017 season would be 2017.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Value for the stat category. i.e: '20'

api_list.name: NCAA - Get Player Data
api_list.description: Get the Player Data from the NCAA Stats website.

required_parameters.name: rankingPeriod
required_parameters.description: Integer value indicating the ranking period. i.e: '52'

required_parameters.name: division
required_parameters.description: Division, for college football: 11 for FBS, 12 for FCS, otherwise 1 for Division-I, 2 for Division-II, 3 for Division-III.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Value for the stat category. i.e: '20'

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: Sport abbreviation. Acceptable values: 'MBA' = Baseball, 'MBB' = Men's basketball, 'MFB' = Men's Football, 'MIH' = Men's Ice-hockey, 'MLA' = Men's Lacrosse', 'MSO' = Men's Soccer, 'MTE' = Men's Tennis, 'MVB' = Men's Volleyball, 'MWP' = Men's Water Polo, 'WBB' = Women's Basketball, 'WBW' = Women's Bowling, 'WFH' = Field Hockey, 'WIH' = Women's Ice-Hockey, 'WLA' = Women's Lacrosse, 'WSB' = Women's Softball, 'WSO' = Women's Soccer, 'WSV' = Women's Beach Volleyball, 'WTE' = Women's Tennis, 'WVB' = Women's Volleyball, 'WWP' = Women's Water Polo

required_parameters.name: season
required_parameters.description: Season of query, value for 2016-2017 season would be 2017.

required_parameters.name: gameHigh
required_parameters.description: Logical, indicating whether the statistic desired is of the game-high variety. 'Y' | 'N'

api_list.name: NCAA - Sports Division Data

required_parameters.name: gameHigh
required_parameters.description: logical, indicating whether the statistic desired is of the game-high variety

required_parameters.name: rankingPeriod
required_parameters.description: Integer value indicating the ranking period

required_parameters.name: sport
required_parameters.description: Sport abbreviation. Acceptable values: 'MBA' = Baseball, 'MBB' = Men's basketball, 'MFB' = Men's Football, 'MIH' = Men's Ice-hockey, 'MLA' = Men's Lacrosse', 'MSO' = Men's Soccer, 'MTE' = Men's Tennis, 'MVB' = Men's Volleyball, 'MWP' = Men's Water Polo, 'WBB' = Women's Basketball, 'WBW' = Women's Bowling, 'WFH' = Field Hockey, 'WIH' = Women's Ice-Hockey, 'WLA' = Women's Lacrosse, 'WSB' = Women's Softball, 'WSO' = Women's Soccer, 'WSV' = Women's Beach Volleyball, 'WTE' = Women's Tennis, 'WVB' = Women's Volleyball, 'WWP' = Women's Water Polo
